001package com.github.sormuras.bach.external;
002
003import static com.github.sormuras.bach.external.Maven.central;
004
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocator;
006
007/** Locates "JUnit" modules via their Maven Central artifacts. */
008public record JUnit(String version) implements ExternalModuleLocator {
009
010  /**
011   * Constructs a new JUnit module locator with the given version.
012   *
013   * @param version the JUnit version
014   */
015  public static JUnit version(String version) {
016    return new JUnit(version);
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  public String caption() {
021    return "JUnit " + version;
022  }
023
024  @Override
025  public String locate(String module) {
026    var jupiterVersion = version;
027    var platformVersion = "1" + version.substring(1); // "5..." -> "1..."
028    var guardianVersion = "1.1.2";
029    var opentestVersion = "1.2.0";
030
031    return switch (module) {
032      case "org.apiguardian.api" -> central("org.apiguardian", "apiguardian-api", guardianVersion);
033      case "org.junit.jupiter" -> central("org.junit.jupiter", "junit-jupiter", jupiterVersion);
034      case "org.opentest4j" -> central("org.opentest4j", "opentest4j", opentestVersion);
035      default -> {
036        if (module.startsWith("org.junit.jupiter")) {
037          var artifact = module.substring(4).replace('.', '-');
038          yield central("org.junit.jupiter", artifact, jupiterVersion);
039        }
040        if (module.startsWith("org.junit.platform")) {
041          var artifact = module.substring(4).replace('.', '-');
042          yield central("org.junit.platform", artifact, platformVersion);
043        }
044        yield null;
045      }
046    };
047  }
048}
